overview: Piccolo player Mike Scanlon loses his girl due to his unexciting lifestyle, so he decides to commit a robbery to gain notoriety. But the robbery goes awry and Mike finds himself on the run from the police, pretending to be a famous singer whose gimmick is wearing a mask in public.
tagline: HE TRIED TO POSE AS A GROOM...but he couldn't hold the pose!
title: Here Comes the Groom
